properties.areaDesc: Lawrence, AR; Lonoke, AR; Independence, AR; White, AR; Monroe, AR; Prairie, AR; Jackson, AR; Woodruff, AR; Sharp, AR
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 1:17AM CST until January 11 at 2:15AM CST by NWS Little Rock AR
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Woodruff County in eastern Arkansas...
Independence County in north central Arkansas...
Northern Prairie County in central Arkansas...
Jackson County in eastern Arkansas...
Northeastern Lonoke County in central Arkansas...
Northwestern Monroe County in eastern Arkansas...
Eastern White County in central Arkansas...
Southwestern Lawrence County in eastern Arkansas...
South central Sharp County in north central Arkansas...

* Until 215 AM CST.

* At 116 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from near Newark to near Jacksonport to 7 miles northeast
of Russell to Hurricane Lake WMA to near Barrettsville, moving
northeast at 25 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
Searcy...                         Batesville...
Newport...                        Walnut Ridge...
Brinkley...                       Hoxie...
Augusta...                        Des Arc...
Hazen...                          Bald Knob...
Judsonia...                       Tuckerman...
Kensett...                        Diaz...
Newark...                         Swifton...
Higginson...                      Patterson...
Grubbs...                         Fredonia...

This includes the following highways...
Interstate 40 between mile markers 192 and 219.
US Highway 67 between mile markers 43 and 101, and between mile
markers 109 and 119.
properties.instruction:
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for eastern,
central and north central Arkansas.

For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.

Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and flash
flooding may occur. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded
roadways.
